first_story_block:
You wake up. In the middle of nowhere. Your head hurts and your feet are asleepl. Your name is...you can't remember. You wonder how you got here. It seems like you're in a tower. A dimly lit tower without any windows. This doesn't look good.


You walk around. Maybe if you explore a bit, you'd be able to find out what you are doing here.

action_results.result: You step on a crumpled piece of paper. Have a look at it before you leave. (You will drop this on the next page.)
You walk up the stairs. This floor looks like a bedroom. You see a double bed, a bedside table, a vase, a rocking chair and... an axe. This could be useful.
You spot a box that looks like its been tossed aside by someone. It's full of dents. You try to open it, but it needs a combination. You'd better find it. For all you know the keys might be inside.
This looks like the lounge room. Cobwebs hung from the ceiling, giving the room an eerie, gothic feel.  There are a number of places the keys could be.
You crawl under the table. Your hair brushes an enormous spiderweb, but you don't care. You spot a note. Good. Another clue from Mitsue. You wish she'd tell you where she actually was.
You find it. A key. Your first key. This is going better than you expected. Only two more keys to find and you're out of here! You'd better find Mitsue...
